name: Vape Nation: An h3h3 Adventure
description:
Note:
Game is in development. This is just the current state.

Plot:
Play as Ethan Klein (h3h3) and save your wife Hila who has been kidnapped by memes. Use your vape clouds to attack memes. Picking up sodie pop allows you to rip larger, more powerful cotton.

Controls:

Left/Right - Run
Up - Jump
Down - Crouch
A - Normal Attack
S - Special Attack
Any Key - Advance Dialogue
